page.title: 09Langdale School,Woodlesford
page.content: Our school was burnt down by two boys playing with matches,on Easter Monday,April 1984.Four classrooms and the hall were burnt.Straight after the fire we got one porta_cabin for classes one and three.All of the parents had meetings to decide if they would build the school again.If if had been decided not to build it again ,it would have been knocked down and every one would have to go to neighbouring schools.They have begun re building.The hall will be finished in September and the two classrooms in February.I am in the last year and we have not been able to do P.E. or assemblys all year.For the school to be rebuilt it will cost about Â£200,000.
